r1.title: EVENT LOACTION
r1.details: Regarding the current special safety precautions, the event will be held in a well organized and prepared place, where all of our team works as a flame for you and your health. The place where the TEDx Ismailia STEM Event will be held is Syndicate of Applicators, you can check the location here: Location

r2.title: TIME
r2.details: Mark your calendars for TEDx Youth Ismailia STEM marvelous Event that will be held on 16-2-2021!

m1.memRole: Gaming reactor especially react on pubg mobile players

m2.memRole: Software team leader and technical consulter

m7.memRole: Video creator, public speaker, comedian, and civil marine engineer
